sentences.sContent: He made no attempt to disguise his agitation.
He is a master of disguise.
...The 10-hour days crashed around my head; no amount of make-up could disguise my ill health as I battled against the odds to prove to myself that I could still make it in the business world...

exam.question: She cut her hair short and tried to ________ herself as a man.

answer.explain: 句意： 为了扮成男的， 她把头发剪短了。decorate： 装饰， 修饰； fabricate： 制作， 捏造； fake： 伪造， 捏造。

synos.tran: 伪装；假装；用作伪装的东西

phrases.pCn: 伪装，假扮成；托辞；以……为借口

remMethod.val: dis(表加强) ＋ guise(伪装) → 伪装； 掩饰

trans.tranOther: to hide sth or change it, so that it cannot be recognized
the art of changing your appearance so that people do not recognize you
